reviewText: Except for the awkward shape and size of the box (making it hard to leave in it and store with the regular DVDs) this set is amazing for royal lovers like myself and a informative to those with just a passing glance at the royals (like my mother who is now turning into me and giving out royal facts at random)
I knew I'd really like it when I ordered it but I have to say I truly enjoyed it and have watched it in it's entirety twice now and plan to watch it all again....Terrific !
This is a wonderful collection of films. They have had varying degrees of critical acclaim but all are well acted, interesting, and worth seeing more than once.

very fascinating set. info on Kings/Queens back to Victoria's time. for those interested in British Royal history, this is a worthwhile investment. I especially enjoyed the DVD featuring King George and Queen Mary (William's great-grandparents). After viewing the background DVDs I can see just how much modernizing has taken place in the Monarchy.

George and Mary, Victoria's Children, the Coronation etc. all very enjoyable. The only problem with Victoria's Children is that it kind of ends mid story - it's easy to find info on them as youngsters. We can read about their weddings and deaths. Other than Leopoldo, we weren't given any insight into life beyond the statistics.

I am an avid British history buff and I have to say this collection is excellent. There are things about the Royal Family that I didn't know about, such as Queen Victoria's children. The commentaries are very good. I highly recommend this DVD collection.

The information on the first video alone--"Queen Victoria's Children" was worth the price of the set to me. I appreciated all the archival footage and the fact that Victoria's darker side gets as much screen time as her accomplishments.

This collection arrived in a wonderful decorative box. Inside the box was four separate DVDs of the Monarch and family. For a collection that displayed old and somewhat rare footage, the picture was better than what was expected however, very little new info was added that a loyal Royal watcher would not have already seen. If you are just starting your journey of the Royals, this would be a great set to lead you down the path. If you are a Royal watcher, this of course is a must have set.
Ordered this set of DVD's for my wife because she loves the queen. She was so happy with them and has loved watching them.
Great value.
I like that I can buy 4 DVDs in one package.  It's a nice selection about Britain's royal family.
We received a Canadian format DVD which is unplayable on Australian DVD players. Please replace with an Australian playable DVD.
Great collection.
I am very pleased with it.

Awesome collection for fans of British films and at a terrific price! Blu-rays are packaged in a nifty, regal-looking box. Would've given the set 5 stars but one of the films (Vanity Fair) didn't have Closed-Captioning (CC), which is essential for the hearing-impaired. Having CC also helps even normal-hearing viewers understand British accents that can be difficult to decipher!

I have viewed all but one of the collection and enjoyed the variety and quality of each film very much.  Were it not for the fact I have not viewed them all at this time I would probably have given it five stars.  The one I have not yet viewed is "Vanity Fair" as I am now reading the book.  I wanted to read it before I viewed it as I felt this would enhance my viewing experience and the book was on hand. I feel confident once I do view the last film that I will enjoy it as much as the others.  I will view them again that much too is certain.  I had seen various reviews critical of the visual or sound quality but do not let that persuade you to deny yourself this collection.  Should anyone be considering this collection I encourage them to proceed with the purchase as they will in all probability enjoy it very much.
Excellent historical events of the royal family
very good
Great quality. Quick Service!
Every one of these DVDs are terrific. My one complaint is all the commercials at the beginning.
can't miss with these movies!
I love, love this collection and the price was amazing.  Thanks Amazon.
All 5 movies have special features.
A very good collection... Very informative!

This Special Collectors Edition is outstanding for the very low price, an for what all comes with this Royal Collection! This Set was made and released to coinside with the Royal marriage of Prince William and  his special Bride Kate. The FIVE Royal Movies enclosed are all absolutly great motion pictures. THE QUEEN, THE KINGS SPEECH, THE YOUNG VICTORIA, SHAKESPEARE IN LOVE AND VANITY FAIR. All HD Blu-Rays!. Also enclosed with this must have Royal Set, are Rare Collectable post cards, and a limited  deluxe Royal purple ribbon Bookmark with a gold metal crown on one end an a gold metal end. The Royal Purple packaging is very nicely done for each of the movie disks, all designed in a book form. With all lettering done in metallic Gold. The movie disk section is divided by a gold satin ribbon. All this, for under $20. Added to your collection, you can display these lil pieces out of British History with pride.
Very pleased
A wonderful set  Marianne
Arrive on time, excellent price and quality video.
Very interesting and well presented.
Excellent collection of movies.

If you love the British royalty this is your box set. This was before Kate was engaged, so she's briefly mentioned & shown. The box set covers Queen Mary, King George, & the present royal family. I got it for a reasonable price. Great to have when you don't have cable/dish & there's nothing on T.V. Would recommend it!
Was a great birthday gift! Very well received by our resident Anglophile.

This is a collection of five great movies for a fantastic price. The Blu-Ray picture and sound are great, the packaging is well thought out and sturdy. I bought these primarily to put into my VUDU on-line digital library; they added a much needed touch of class to my already action movie heavy collection.

Very Good Collection.  I bought it first because I wanted to get King George and Queen Mary, the Royals who saved the Monarchy.  I found it wasn't available as just it - I had to buy this set to get that.  I already had Queen Victoria's Children in my library, but I found the Coronation of Queen Elizabeth II and How to Be A Prince very interesting.  Over the years, I have seen snippets of the Coronation and marveled at how glamorous she was that day and seeing the whole ceremony was beautiful.  I am an Anglophile and these titles are wonderful additions to my library.
Excellent.
This is a wonderful collection and a real bargain.
I love all the movies in this box; however, I gave only 3 stars because of its quality.  You get what you pay for.
My brother loved this gift and he is not easy to please.
Love most of the movies in here. A couple are a bit too risque for me though. I got it for $15, so it was worth it for the movies I wanted (ON BLU-RAY EVEN!)
great
Got this for a great price. I couldn't pass it up.
Great package for Anglophiles!

This is an excellent collection of DVD's on the Royals in England, very interesting and informative. Wonderful pictures, I have already viewed it twice and will continue to watch it from time to time. I would urge anyone interested in the Royal's to order this product. Also it was to my home very quickly.

Every movies in this collection is a gem!  I love the packaging. It fits on the bookshelf nicely and the bonus "Royal" bookmark I found inside was a pleasant surprise. I like the pictures, too. They show shots of the actors I had not seen before.
Nicely packaged gift set of 5 well done British movies that was well received as a birthday gift top a friend.
Very good movies.
Great assembly of movies and in blue ray ..  I hadn't owned any of them so it was a win win for me.
Very good movies.
Excellent buy and very timely delivery.
All are good movies. I like to buy from Amazon.com. It is really a good website for shipping for almost everything.
IN two of these films ( Shakespear in Love ) and ( Vanity Fair )  I could understand very little of the dialogue.
I am a great admirer of the queen, and really like these.

If you enjoy watching the royals, this is the set for you. It covers everything, past and present, about the Windsors. The DVDs are
of good quality (sound, picture, etc.) Well worth the money.
Some of my favorite films in here!

I bought this set mainly for The Queen. The King's Speech is also a favorite so this was an excellent purchase option. Young Victoria another wonderful movie also comes in this amazing set. Shakespeare in Love and Vanity Fair are also included.

I was trying to be thrifty in purchasing this set of bluray movies as I love most of the British films, especially The King's Speech and Young Victoria. But to my disappointment, forty minutes into The King's Speech the disc started freezing and skipping. Now I know my eight month old Sony 3 Bluray player is not to blame because it is an awesome quality player that plays my old dvd and new bluray discs with no problems. It has to be a manufacturing defect during transfer process because there are no scratches or blemishes and I cleaned it and viewed it several times. I will have to view all of the discs in the set before deciding if I have to just buy all of the original blurays separately. I would rather they be of better quality to last long term in my library. I will update my review to let you know of the outcome.

Review Aug 8, 2014
I ended up purchasing The Kings Speech separately as the other movies were fine. So I am changing the number of stars.
I just couldn't wait to open this DVD collection, it is very nicely done, including a booklet from the Queen's Coronation Day, a definite for your collection.
Any anglophile desiring to update and add new extensive, and even perhaps some unseen before film footage? Get this one!
excellent classic dvd
This DVD set is a treasure and I am so happy I bought it.  Any fan of the Royal Family will enjoy this DVD set.  Highly recommend it.  A++++++++  History in the making.
Good films and affordable.  best are Shakespeare in Love, The King's Speech, and The Young Victoria.
great movies and great price..
Bought this for my mother, she loved it!

Excellent gift for Anglophiles and history buffs.
"The Young Victoria" , a moving portrait of an unappreciated period of Queen Victoria's reign, was the "sleeper" in the set.  Emily Blunt (Queen Victoria), Jim Broadbent (King William) and Paul Bettany (Lord Melbourne) were stellar.
Great collection all my favorites in one box
this had all my favorite movies in it and I have enjoed being able to watch them over a d over again I recommend this collection.

What do you get older, comfortable loved ones that have most everything - THE ROYAL COLLECTION!!! It was a very elegant, lovely presentation of these great movies! I was so pleased; it was perfect! Thank you, Amazon!!!
Great for British history buffs
